form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Peters (for himself, Mr. Cornyn, Mr. Wicker, Ms. Baldwin, and Mr. Young) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation

form.official-title: To ensure an equitable geographic distribution of projects selected through the Port Infrastructure Development Program.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Securing Smart Investments in our Ports Act.

subsection.text: Section 54301(a)(6)(B) of title 46, United States Code, is amended—

paragraph.text: in clause (ii), by striking and after the semicolon;
in clause (iii), by striking the period and inserting ; and; and
by adding at the end the following:

clause.text: ensuring equitable geographic distribution among regions of the United States with regard to the projects selected.

subsection.header: Assistance for small inland river and coastal ports and terminals
subsection.text: Section 54301(b)(4) of title 46, United States Code, is amended—

paragraph.text: in subparagraph (C), by striking the period at the end and inserting ; and; and
by adding at the end the following:

subparagraph.text: ensure equitable geographic distribution among regions of the United States with regard to the projects selected.
